name: HellCandy
description:
Hell Candy is a Fast FPS where you're gonna have to  kill candy monsters.

Annihilate waves of monsters, complete the levels and strike down the final boss.

Post your highscore in the comments !

 Controls : ( Playable as QWERTY or AZERTY )

     - Move = WASD/ZQSD

     - Dash = Left MAJ

     - Switch Weapons = Mouse wheel or press 1 , 2 , 3

     - Shoot = Left mouse button

     - Throw a grenade = G or mouse wheel button

     - Slash = Q/A

     - Open a chest = E

     - Mute Music = M

This game is a 2nd year student project made in 2 months and a half by a group of 4 people :

- Valentin HERNANDEZ : Coding / Game Design / Level Design / Sound Design

- Léo TOULISSE : Coding / Game Design / Level Design / Sound Design

- Valentin BIDEAULT : Environement / Level Building / Texturing / Lightning / Sound Design

- Bastien FONTAINE : Monsters / Weapons / Modeling / Animation / UI / Texturing

Music by Smokinkat records

Feel free to report any bug that you might encounter.
